pr_title: PLFM-6378: API to fetch the access approval notifications

timeline.message: PLFM-6378: Add method to fetch notifications
PLFM-6378: Expose notification list request to the manager
PLFM-6378: Expose new API to fetch approval notifications

timeline.bodyText: Marcos says this should be an IN clause.
timeline.author: jay-hodgson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -44,6 +47,11 @@
 			+ " AND " + COL_DATA_ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_REQUIREMENT_ID + " = ?" 
 			+ " AND " + COL_DATA_ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_RECIPIENT_ID + " = ?";
 	
+	private static final String SQL_SELECT_FOR_RECIPIENTS = "SELECT * FROM " + TABLE_DATA_ACCESS_NOTIFICATION
+			+ " WHERE " + COL_DATA_ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_REQUIREMENT_ID + " = :" + COL_DATA_ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_REQUIREMENT_ID 
+			+ " AND " + COL_DATA_ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_RECIPIENT_ID + " = :" + COL_DATA_ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_RECIPIENT_ID

timeline.message: PLFM-6378: Must be a admin or ACT to send the request
